description:
The gang helps Keiichiro train for a sports festival at school. A mysterious boy shows up at the track, running alongside Keiichiro. Despite the bonding between the two, it seems the new boy isn`t quite alive--and he`s got a penchant for cutting off the feet of those who run!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A sports festival painted with blood... Datto!!
血塗られた体育祭 だっと!!
